name: Wedding Witch
description:
Wedding Witch is a rogue-like, exploring randomly created maps, fighting with devils and finding the potion of Succubus.

The potion of Succubus is hidden somewhere in the forest of the labyrinth filled with devils.



Drinking the potion of the Succubus, the witch's body transforms. What kind of body type do you want?



The Witch may learn a new spell whenever she drinks the potion of Succubus. Make your own spell combinations.

The magic flower, containing mysterious power, is in the forest of the labyrinth. Put it in the witch's bouquet to get a new power!



Find the potion of the Succubus, escape the forest of the labyrinth and make it happy ending!
